metadata.name: Chakra Artpunks #6864
metadata.description: Orange Comet has created 6865 unique NFTs that are curated smart contract-generated artpunks featuring the first-ever Hollywood-meets-Bollywood Superhero co-created by Stan Lee. Now, BeyondLife.club brings you its signature Loot Box in its latest Chakra the Invincible NFT offering. Every Loot Box owner, in their blind purchase, gets a unique Chakra The Invincible official NFT!
